short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Xournal is an application for notetaking, sketching and keeping a journal.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Xournal is just one of more than 230 applications available in the cloud on rollApp. Check out the full list at https://www.rollapp.com/apps.

PLEASE NOTE:
- Working with files requires creating account with rollApp and connecting cloud storage (Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive or Box)
- Free rollApp account allows to access your files in read-only mode. Please, subscribe for rollApp Premium to be able to save files

Xournal is an easy to use application for notetaking, sketching and keeping a journal. The app is always with you on the move or at home. Plus, you get access to your files from your cloud storage: Google Drive, Box or Dropbox.

Some of Xournal features:
— Pen tool with five different preset thickness levels
— Eraser tool which can either delete everything in its radius of operation or act as a white pen ("whiteout") mode
— Highlighter tool, which acts as a semitransparent pen allowing to highlight areas of text or image
— Text tool, allowing to add basic blocks of text
— Shape recognizer, which can be enabled alongside with the pen to automatically detect circles, lines and polygons when they are drawn and replace them with a clean version
